content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: wooden_sword
inventory=[{"type": "lapis_block", "quantity": 57, "index": 10}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 11}, {"type": "acacia_pressure_plate", "quantity": 41, "index": 12}, {"type": "dark_oak_wood", "quantity": 1, "index": 22}, {"type": "jungle_wood", "quantity": 1, "index": 24}, {"type": "acacia_door", "quantity": 56, "index": 34}, {"type": "vindicator_spawn_egg", "quantity": 45, "index": 45}]
thought: To craft a wooden sword I first need to craft jungle planks. Jungle planks can be crafted from jungle wood which is in slot 24. I will first move the jungle wood into the crafting grid.
Ok
act: move from slot 24 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: wooden_sword
inventory=[{"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 0}, {"type": "jungle_wood", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "lapis_block", "quantity": 57, "index": 10}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 11}, {"type": "acacia_pressure_plate", "quantity": 41, "index": 12}, {"type": "dark_oak_wood", "quantity": 1, "index": 22}, {"type": "acacia_door", "quantity": 56, "index": 34}, {"type": "vindicator_spawn_egg", "quantity": 45, "index": 45}]
thought: Now that the jungle wood is in the crafting grid, I can craft the jungle planks and move them to an empty slot (eg., 13).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 13 with quantity 4

TASK: Craft an item of type: wooden_sword
inventory=[{"type": "lapis_block", "quantity": 57, "index": 10}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 11}, {"type": "acacia_pressure_plate", "quantity": 41, "index": 12}, {"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 13}, {"type": "dark_oak_wood", "quantity": 1, "index": 22}, {"type": "acacia_door", "quantity": 56, "index": 34}, {"type": "vindicator_spawn_egg", "quantity": 45, "index": 45}]
thought: To craft the wooden sword I need to place a stick in the crafting grid. Since I have 4 jungle planks, I will place 1 in slot 1 and the other 3 in slots 2 and 3.
Ok
act: move from slot 13 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: wooden_sword
inventory=[{"type": "jungle_button", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "lapis_block", "quantity": 57, "index": 10}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 11}, {"type": "acacia_pressure_plate", "quantity": 41, "index": 12}, {"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 3, "index": 13}, {"type": "dark_oak_wood", "quantity": 1, "index": 22}, {"type": "acacia_door", "quantity": 56, "index": 34}, {"type": "vindicator_spawn_egg", "quantity": 45, "index": 45}]
thought: Since I have 3 jungle planks, I will place 1 in slot 4 and the other 2 in slots 2 and 3.
Ok
act: move from slot 13 to slot 4 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: wooden_sword
inventory=[{"type": "stick", "quantity": 4, "index": 0}, {"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "lapis_block", "quantity": 57, "index": 10}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 11}, {"type": "acacia_pressure_plate", "quantity": 41, "index": 12}, {"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 2, "index": 13}, {"type": "dark_oak_wood", "quantity": 1, "index": 22}, {"type": "acacia_door", "quantity": 56, "index": 34}, {"type": "vindicator_spawn_egg", "quantity": 45, "index": 45}]
thought: Since I have 1 stick, I will place it in slot 7.
Ok
act: move from slot 11 to slot 7 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: wooden_sword
inventory=[{"type": "wooden_sword", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 7}, {"type": "lapis_block", "quantity": 57, "index": 10}, {"type": "acacia_pressure_plate", "quantity": 41, "index": 12}, {"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 2, "index": 13}, {"type": "dark_oak_wood", "quantity": 1, "index": 22}, {"type": "acacia_door", "quantity": 56, "index": 34}, {"type": "vindicator_spawn_egg", "quantity": 45, "index": 45}]
thought: Now that the wooden sword is in the crafting grid, I can craft it and move it to an empty slot (eg., 11).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 1
